By Lisa Shock on Tuesday, August 24, 2010 - 05:17 pm:

Well, it's blocked to non Japanese IPs, and we didn't find a virtual client to help us play this version of the game. We were able to find a workaround for the older betas, but not this finished game.

It's also very text heavy.
